This study single-center , double-blind 4 month duration trial .
DOC.brief_title: Deep Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation Treatment Alzheimer 's Disease
DOC.detailed_description: Primary outcome measure : ADAS-COG ( time frame baseline , 2 month , 4 month ) Secondary outcome measure : CGI-C , FAB , ADL , Neuropsychological computerize test ( time frame baseline , 2 month , 4 month . Estimated enrollment : 40 patient Estimated Study start Date : November 2008 Estimated Study Completion date : November 2009 Number arm : 2 Ages : 50-85 Genders :
DOC.criteria: 1 . Men woman age 5085 . 2 . Diagnosed Alzheimer 's disease least one year ( DSMIV criterion ) . 3 . Scored 24 MMSE . 4 . Received drug therapy disease , treatment administer acceptable dosage least 5 week , either effect partial response . 5 . Answered negative question preTMS treatment safety questionnaire . 6 . Gave oral write consent participate trial . Exclusion criterion : 1 . An additional neurological psychiatric disorder . 2 . Severe personality disorder . 3 . Uncontrolled hypertension . 4 . History epilepsy , seizure , heat convulsion . 5 . History epilepsy seizure first degree relative . 6 . History head injury stroke . 7 . History metal implant head ( except dental filling ) . 8 . History surgery entail metallic implant know history metallic particle eye , implanted cardiac pacemaker , cochlear implant , use neurostimulators , medical pump . 9 . History migraine last six month . 10 . History drug alcohol abuse . 11 . Inadequate communication examiner . 12 . Participation another clinical study , either concurrent trial 3 month precede . 13 . Inability sign consent form .
